column1: Local Foods////Lots has already been written about this spot. I can't add alot
column2: except that it is a very enjoyable place. A wide open dining area
column4: and find a seat. A small menu of sandwiches
column6: and sides. The duck confit is very good. The mayo aoli is a bit to rich for me. Though the sandwich as a hole is good. The orzo
column8: and mintade are all awesome. The service at the counter is very knowledgable and the food comes out fresh. A very good spot to grab lunch in the village.
